code: import{initializeApp}from'firebase/app';import{getAuth,connectAuthEmulator}from'firebase/auth';import{getDatabase,connectDatabaseEmulator}from'firebase/database';var firebaseConfig={apiKey:"AIzaSyCyUfIEyDGmwGZJU-VTbifk8ZhAStYRn24",authDomain:"catty-message.firebaseapp.com",databaseURL:"https://catty-message-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com",projectId:"catty-message",storageBucket:"catty-message.firebasestorage.app",messagingSenderId:"762334512293",appId:"1:762334512293:web:d3edbbb5de41c29c43f94c"};var app=initializeApp(firebaseConfig);var auth=getAuth(app);var database=getDatabase(app);if(typeof window!=='undefined'){auth.setPersistence('local');database.enablePersistence().catch(function(err){if(err.code==='failed-precondition'){console.warn('Multiple tabs open, persistence can only be enabled in one tab at a time.');}else if(err.code==='unimplemented'){console.warn('The current browser does not support persistence.');}});}if("production"==='development'){try{connectAuthEmulator(auth,'http://localhost:9099');connectDatabaseEmulator(database,'localhost',9000);}catch(error){console.warn('Error connecting to emulators:',error);}}export{auth,database};
